name: Sarkar A'ala Hazrat Alaih-ir-Rahma:
content: Sog mein asl siyah libas hai, woh toh Rafiziyon ne liya aur unhein zeiba bhi tha, ki ek toh unke dilon ki bhi yahi rangat hai. Doosre yeh ki

name: Imam Shafi'i Rahmatullah Alayh:
content: Shi'a is ummat ki auraten hain. Sog aur matam auraton hi ko khoob aate hain.

name: Shaykh Fariduddin Attar  رحمة الله عليه
content: Buzurgon ke damaan ko chhodne wale har daur mein gumrah hue hain.

name: Muqallid o Ghair Muqallid mein Farq
content: Jo mareez tabeeb se ilaaj karwaye aur sehhat yaab ho jaye usay Muqallid kehte hain.Jo atibba (doctors) se ladey, pansaari ki dukaan se apni marzi ki dawa utha kar khata rahe aur apne marz ko aisa bigaare ke phir tabeeb bhi usko la ilaaj qarar de de, usay Ghair Muqallid kehte hain.
